content: HBC-T Serrated T-bolts Serrated T-bolts for tension, perpendicular and parallel shear loads (3D loads) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Bolts & washers- - ### FEATURES:Features Matching serrated teeth on the channel lips and bolts form a mechanical interlock – increasing the load resistance along the channel’s longitudinal axis Low torque moment for easier, faster and safer installation on site Universal fit – the same T-bolts can be used in both HAC-T50 and HAC-T70 anchor channels to help simplify logistics and reduce the scope for errors Applications For use with HAC-T50 to HAC-T70 anchor channels ### TECHNICAL DATA: PROFIS Software: Yes Product type: T-bolts Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Carbon Steel, Hot-Dip Galvanized, Carbon steel, zinc-plated | Compatible Anchor Channel | HAC-T50, HAC-T70, HAC-30 | Channel profile | HAC-V-T 50, HAC-V-T 70, HAC-V-T EDGE, HAC-V-T Rebar XTS | PROFIS Software | Yes | Product type | T-bolts ### ITEMS- 433534 - T-head bolt HBC-B M12x40 4.6F - Package Size 100 pc Package Contents: - 1x HBC-B M12x40 4.6F T-head bolt - 1x DIN934-M12-8-tZn Hexagon nut - 433527 - T-bolt HBC-B M10x40 4.6G - Package Size 100 pc Package Contents: -
